Verse: I'm Paul. I'm in a prison because I follow Jesus Christ. Philemon, Timothy and I are writing this letter to you. Timothy also believes in Jesus Christ. We love you and know that you serve Jesus Christ like we serve Jesus Christ.

We are also writing this letter to Apphia, who also believes in Jesus Christ, and Archippus, who also struggles for Jesus Christ with us. And we are also writing this letter to the other people who worship God in your house.~!~(NP we ) (VP are[Pre-Verbal] (AdvP also ) writ+ing[Participle] ) (NP this[Proximity] letter ) (NP to Apphia [ , (NP who ) (NP ) (VP (AdvP also ) believe+s[Third_Singular_Present] ) (NP in Jesus (NP _ Christ ) ) , ] ) (NP and Archippus [ , (NP who ) (NP ) (VP (AdvP also ) struggle+s[Third_Singular_Present] ) (NP for Jesus (NP _ Christ ) ) (NP with us ) , ] ) . and (NP we ) (VP are[Pre-Verbal] (AdvP also ) writ+ing[Participle] ) (NP this[Proximity] letter ) (NP to the[Article] (AdjP other ) people [ who[Relativizer] (NP ) (VP worship ) (NP God ) (NP in (NP _ your ) house ) ] ) .

We pray that God, who is our Father, and Jesus Christ, who is our Lord, will treat you kindly. And we pray that God and Jesus Christ will cause you to be peaceful.~!~(NP we ) (VP pray ) [ that[Complementizer] (NP God [ , (NP who ) (NP ) (VP is ) (NP (NP _ our ) Father ) , ] ) (NP and Jesus (NP _ Christ ) [ , (NP who ) (NP ) (VP is ) (NP (NP _ our ) Lord ) , ] ) (VP will[INFL] treat ) (NP you ) (AdvP kindly ) ] . and (NP we ) (VP pray ) [ that[Complementizer] (NP God ) (NP and Jesus (NP _ Christ ) ) (VP will[INFL] cause ) (NP you ) [ (NP ) (VP to[INFL] be ) (AdjP peaceful ) ] ] .

I thank God because I heard good news that is about you. I heard that you continue trusting in the Lord Jesus. I pray that God will teach you about all of the good things that he has given to us. And I pray that God will unite you with other Christians. But Onesimus left Philemon.~!~(NP I ) (VP am ask+ing[Participle] ) (NP you ) [ (NP ) (VP to[INFL] welcome ) (NP Onesimus ) ] .
